item.title: About
item.description: Presentation Hi there! I am a biophysicist and entrepreneur based in Paris. With my friends Diane-Laure and Fanny we’re building the platform that will enable researchers and clinicians to treat cancer as a rare disease, at scale. We do this thanks to the combined power of automation, AI and, most importantly, patient-derived organoids. These small clumps of patient cells reproduce key features of the tumour they come from and by analyzing their responses to drugs we can gain insights on how patients would have reacted.
